meanings.definition: The leaves of a widely cultivated plant, eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating fresh spinaches in my salad.
meanings.sent2: Spinaches are a nutritious addition to any meal.
meanings.sent3: Why did the spinach go to the party? To become the life of the salad!
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a sea of green, with spinaches waving in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of spinaches always reminds me of nature's goodness.

meanings.definition: A plant of the goosefoot family, with large, dark green leaves that are eaten as a vegetable.
meanings.sent1: Spinaches are rich in vitamins and minerals.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested fresh spinaches from the field.
meanings.sent3: The spinaches in the garden seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was evident in the delicious spinaches she prepared.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sautéed spinaches filled the kitchen with a delightful fragrance.
